Bash("C:\\Users\\Peter\\Desktop\\코스닥신규상장분석\\krx_data\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import sys, io
sys.stdout = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stdout.buffer, encoding=''utf-8''\)
import pandas as pd

# Check what columns exist for our stocks
df_raw = pd.read_excel\(''C:/Users/Peter/Desktop/코스닥신규상장분석/dg_sheet.xlsx'', sheet_name=''Sheet3'', header=None\)
codes = df_raw.iloc[9:, 0].values
items = df_raw.iloc[9:, 4].values

# Find columns for our target stocks
targets = [''A377220'', ''A438700'', ''A393890'', ''A389030'', ''A274400'']
for code in targets:
    matches = [\(c, i\) for c, i in zip\(codes, items\) if str\(c\) == code]
    if matches:
        print\(f''{code}: {[m[1] for m in matches]}''\)
    else:
        print\(f''{code}: NOT FOUND''\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\Peter\\Desktop\\코스닥신규상장분석\\krx_data\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import sys, io
sys.stdout = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stdout.buffer, encoding=''utf-8''\)

# Verify ipo_mcap and ipo_offering using 공모가 \(not 수정공모가\)
stocks = [
    \(''프롬바이오'', 18000, 2400000, 13835000, ''2,490억'', ''432억''\),
    \(''버넥트'', 16000, 1920000, 10869600, ''1,739억'', ''307억''\),
    \(''더블유씨피'', 60000, 7200000, 33696518, ''20,218억'', ''4,320억''\),
    \(''지니너스'', 20000, 2000000, 10869315, ''2,174억'', ''400억''\),
    \(''이노시뮬레이션'', 15000, 900000, 7819826, ''1,173억'', ''135억''\),
]

for name, ipo_price, ipo_shares, total_shares, blog_mcap, blog_offering in stocks:
    mcap = ipo_price * total_shares
    offering = ipo_price * ipo_shares
    mcap_str = f''{mcap/1e8:,.0f}억''
    offering_str = f''{offering/1e8:,.0f}억''
    mcap_ok = ''✓'' if mcap_str == blog_mcap else f''✗ \(blog={blog_mcap}\)''
    offering_ok = ''✓'' if offering_str == blog_offering else f''✗ \(blog={blog_offering}\)''
    print\(f''{name}: 시가총액={mcap_str} {mcap_ok} | 공모금액={offering_str} {offering_ok}''\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\Peter\\Desktop\\코스닥신규상장분석\\krx_data\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import sys, io
sys.stdout = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stdout.buffer, encoding=''utf-8''\)
import json

with open\(''C:/Users/Peter/Desktop/코스닥신규상장분석/krx_data/vc_analysis/vc_analysis_amt.json'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    data = json.load\(f\)

# Check corp_top_sell for our 5 stocks
targets = {''377220'': ''프롬바이오'', ''438700'': ''버넥트'', ''393890'': ''더블유씨피'', ''389030'': ''지니너스'', ''274400'': ''이노시뮬레이션''}

print\(''=== corp_top_sell에서 검색 ===''\)
for corp in data[''corp_top_sell'']:
    code = corp[''stock_code'']
    if code in targets:
        print\(f''{targets[code]} \({code}\):''\)
        print\(f''  ipo_mcap={corp.get\(""ipo_mcap""\):,}''\)
        print\(f''  ipo_offering={corp.get\(""ipo_offering""\):,}''\)
        print\(f''  net_amount={corp.get\(""net_amount""\):,}''\)
        print\(\)

# Also check all records
print\(''=== records에서 검색 ===''\)
for code, name in targets.items\(\):
    matches = [r for r in data[''records''] if r[''stock_code''] == code]
    if matches:
        # Get unique ipo_mcap and ipo_offering
        mcap = set\(r.get\(''ipo_mcap''\) for r in matches if r.get\(''ipo_mcap''\)\)
        offering = set\(r.get\(''ipo_offering''\) for r in matches if r.get\(''ipo_offering''\)\)
        net = sum\(r.get\(''net_amount'', 0\) for r in matches\)
        print\(f''{name} \({code}\): {len\(matches\)} records''\)
        print\(f''  ipo_mcap={mcap}''\)
        print\(f''  ipo_offering={offering}''\)
        print\(f''  total net_amount={net:,}''\)
    else:
        print\(f''{name} \({code}\): NOT in records''\)
    print\(\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\Peter\\Desktop\\코스닥신규상장분석\\krx_data\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import sys, io
sys.stdout = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stdout.buffer, encoding=''utf-8''\)
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv\(''C:/Users/Peter/Desktop/코스닥신규상장분석/docs/price_trade/data/all_stocks.csv'', encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
# 지니너스 2022-06~08 가격 데이터
gn = df[\(df[''코드''] == ''A389030''\) & \(df[''날짜''] >= ''2022-06-01''\) & \(df[''날짜''] <= ''2022-08-01''\)]
print\(''지니너스 \(A389030\) 2022-06~08 종가 from all_stocks.csv''\)
print\(''=''*40\)
for _, row in gn.iterrows\(\):
    print\(f''{row[""날짜""]}  종가={row[""종가""]:>8,.0f}''\)
")
